amendatorysection.para: An appeal may be taken from the decision of the department upon such hearing as provided by section 61-207.

source.para: Laws 1919, c. 190, tit. VII, art. V, div. 2, § 9, p. 837;

annotation.para: This section does not violate constitutional notions of due process. In re Water Appropriation Nos. 442A, 461, 462, and 485, 210 Neb. 161, 313 N.W.2d 271 (1981).
